DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation safety , tolerability , PK PD ISIS 416858 patient end-stage renal disease ( ESRD ) receive chronic hemodialysis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Safety , PK , & PD ISIS 416858 Administered Subcutaneously Patients With End-Stage Renal Disease Hemodialysis
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation Safety , PK PD ISIS 416858 patient end-stage renal disease ( ESRD ) receive chronic hemodialysis . The overall objective evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics ISIS 416858 ESRD patient hemodialysis .
DOC.criteria: End stage renal disease maintain outpatient hemodialysis healthcare center > 3 month screen hemodialysis use heparin ( unfractionated heparin lowmolecular weight heparin ) 3 time per week minimum 3 hour per dialysis session plan continue throughout study . Documented thrombotic event ( acute coronary syndrome , stroke transient ischemic attack , venous thromboembolic event ) past 3 month . Active bleeding within past 3 month screen document bleed diathesis ( history bleed disorder ) Screening value : Platelet count < 150,000 cells/mm3 INR > 1.4 aPTT > upper limit normal ( ULN ) Abnormal liver function Screening : ALT AST > 2 x ULN Total bilirubin > ULN Concomitant medication restriction : Concomitant use anticoagulant/antiplatelet agent ( e.g. , dabigatran , rivaroxaban , clopidogrel ) may affect coagulation ( except low dose aspirin ( â‰¤ 100 mg/day ) Treatment Posttreatment Evaluation Periods allow . Uncontrolled hypertension judge Investigator . Patients pre postdialysis blood pressure ( BP ) > 160 mmHg least 3 last 5 dialysis treatment . Planned major surgery next 6 month ( e.g . renal transplant surgery )
